entry.title: 3M imperial Marine
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 43.99 - 179.99 (2 variants)

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material removes scratches, oxidation, stains, swirl marks and other blemishes that are robbing your boat of its beauty. This 'two-in-one' compound and polish eliminates common imperfections from fiberglass and marine gel coats. Boats look stunning with refreshed high gloss exteriors when compounded and finished with this special formula.

Does Double Duty for Marine Detailing

3M Marine Compound and Finishing Material restores the lustrous beauty of boats by eliminating oxidation, scratches, scuff marks and other surface blemishes. Its unique formulation combines a compound with finishing polishes, which does a double duty task of removing imperfections and polishing in one application. The simplicity and time savings of a 'two-in-one' product with compound and polish makes it a favorite among boat detailing professionals.

The compound and finishing material is highly rated for scratch removal. Use this product to remove P600-P800 dual action or P1000-P1200 sand scratches with a wool compounding pad. You may also use an air or electric buffer (1500-2500 Max. RPM) equipped with 3M Compound Buff Pads (sold separately). It has a fast cut and delivers a swirl-free finish.

Details

  • Removes light to heavy oxidation.
  • Eliminates sand scratches and swirl marks.
  • Unique formula combines compound and polish.
  • Fast cutting action saves time.
  • Delivers a high gloss finish.

Directions for Use

Before using this product, please reference Product Label and/or Safety Data Sheet for Health and Safety Information:

  • Shake container before using.
  • Apply sufficient material to surface to work a 2 foot by 2 foot area. To minimize slinging, spread the compound over the surface with the compounding pad before starting the machine.
  • Start machine using light to medium pressure.
  • Reduce pressure as compound starts to dry, allowing material to polish surface.
  • Repeat, only if necessary, to remove any remaining sanding marks or swirls.
  • The combined benefits of a compound and polish in one product mean you spend more time relaxing on your boat out on the water and less time detailing it. Enjoyment is what having a boat is all about!

Details

  • Removes light to heavy oxidation.
  • Eliminates sand scratches and swirl marks.
  • Unique formula combines compound and polish.
  • Fast cutting action saves time.
  • Delivers a high gloss finish.

entry.title: 3M Auto - Trizact Hookit Blending Discs
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 9.89 - 11.49 (2 variants)

3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Blending Discs are used to scuff sanding blend panels prior to painting. The soft foam backing preserves orange peel for better texture matching, and can be used damp to prevent loading.

*Price per unit. 15 blending discs/box.

entry.title: 3M Auto Hook-It Sanding Disc Pad Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 39.99

3M™ Hookit™ Sanding Disc Pad Kit contains a dust extraction Hookit™ back up pad, constructed on foam. The backup pad has a 5/16-24 INT thread.

Includes 5 adaptors:

  • 1/4-20 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 1/4-20 INT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 1/4-28 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 5/16-24 EXT X 5/16-24 EXT
  • 5/16-24 EXT X 6mm-1.0 EXT

entry.title: 3M Auto Hook-It Low Profile Sanding Disc Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Equipment
Price: 24.49

3M HOOKIT LOW PROFILE SANDING DISC PAD 3" X 1/2"
SKU: 20350
Company: 3M

3M™ Hookit™ Low Profile Sanding Disc Pads are firm yet flexible to provide versatility for flat sanding applications and are designed to securely hold on a random orbital sander. Low profile firm density foam and blunt 35 degree tapered edge provide durability and an aggressive cut. Use this disc pad with coarse grades where good leveling is needed. Multi-hole pattern evacuates dust better than 5- or 6-hole products.

entry.title: 3M Auto Hand Glaze
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 56.99

3M™ Hand Glaze is a non-silicone, non-wax hand glaze to refine and fill swirl marks after machine polishing. Formulated to work on all colors and all types of automotive paints, and leaves a consistent gloss finish.

  • Hand application
  • Increases surface gloss
  • Works on refinished or factory-applied automotive paints, and can be painted over

entry.title: 3M Auto - Super Duty Rubbing Compound
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 39.99

The 3M™ Super Duty Rubbing Compound is an aggressive compound that remains wet on the job with little or no mess. This 3M™ Super Duty Rubbing Compound maintains a high rate of cut with constant pressure. This product buffs to high gloss with minimum of swirl marks. Can be used by hand or machine.

entry.title: 3M Auto Machine Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 74.99

3M™ Machine Polish helps to quickly and effectively remove compound swirl marks and leaves a mark free finish. It is compatible with most types of paints or clear coats, and is easy to handle, helping to alleviate clean-up. 3M™ Machine Polish contains no waxes or silicones, and is best for dark coloured paint finishes.

entry.title: 3M Auto Cubitron Hook-It Clean Sanding Abrasive Disc
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M Auto
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 88.99

  • 3" size
  • 120+ grade

Cubitron Hookit™ Clean Sanding Abrasive Discs combine the highest 3M technology for automotive repair. Its long-lasting triangular shaped grain and multi-hole pattern for excellent dust extraction make the disc ideal for paint removal, rough body filler shaping, fine feather-edging or final prep before blending or priming. The 3M™ Hookit™ system makes for quick disc change-outs.
